summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Airbnb property listing site. All core functionality working perfectly including navigation, booking flow, modal interactions, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Index page loads correctly with all 4 property listings
Siddha SkyView Studio navigation to details page works
Details page displays property images (main + 2 side images)
Property info, host section, and 10 amenities displayed correctly
Book Now button is enabled and clickable
Booking modal opens with complete booking summary
Payment confirmation flow with 'I Have Paid' button works
Success modal displays proper confirmation message
Modal close buttons function on both booking and success modals
Back button navigation returns to index page
Mobile responsiveness at 375px width works perfectly
Image grid adapts to single column on mobile
Booking section switches to column layout on mobile
All images load properly (property images and QR code)
No console errors or JavaScript issues detected
